instructions: Open the Phone app on your Pixel 4. Tap the Keypad icon in the bottom right-hand corner. Switch Sim Via Dialer App Source: Android Central Enter # #794824746# # into the dialer. A message will appear at the bottom that says Multi-device active .

Open the Settings app on your Pixel 4. Select Network & internet . Tap Mobile network . Switch Active Sim Pixel Settings Source: Android Central Select the network you would like to switch to. Under Mobile data tap on the toggle to turn it on. Confirm that you are switching the network for mobile data. Confirm Sim Switch Pixel Settings Source: Android Central

Download Signal Spy from the Google Play Store. Open Signal Spy on your Pixel 4. Tap the Keypad icon in the bottom right-hand corner to reveal the menu. From the expanded menu, tap on Sim Switch . Sim Switch Signal Spy App Source: Android Central After the Dialer app appears, long-press and hold on the dialer entry. Tap Paste
